post.summary: Initiate a new coverage request or view an existing request.

get.summary: Get the full coverage information by id.

delete.summary: Delete a coverage information by id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A coverage id

count.description: Number of assets in the result set.

customerId.description: The id of the customer that owns this coverage.

createdDate.description: The time and date when this coverage was added to our system.

updatedDate.description: The time and date when this coverage was last updated in our system.

expirationDate.description: The time and date when this coverage will expire from our system.

controlNumber.description: A tracking number we assigned to the coverage transaction.

submitterStatecode.description: The submitting customer's configured state code.

status.description: The current status of the coverage request.

statusCode.description: The current status code of the coverage request.

responsePayerId.description: The id the payer responded with.

responseName.description: The name the payer responded with.

lastName.description: The requesting provider's last or business name.

npi.description: The requesting provider's national provider id.

payerAssignedProviderId.description: The requesting provider's payer assigned provider id.

placeOfService.description: The requesting provider's place of service.

placeOfServiceCode.description: The requesting provider's place of service code.

name.description: The coverage summary additional payer's name.

serviceTypeCode.description: The coverage summary additional payer's service type code.

insuredMemberId.description: The coverage summary additional payer's insured member id.

secondary.description: Indicates whether or not this is a secondary payer.

tertiary.description: Indicates whether or not this is a tertiary payer.
